meanings.sent1: She underreacting to the news of the canceled event.
meanings.sent2: He always underreacting to surprises, staying calm in any situation.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked that his friend was underreacting to the exploding cake.
meanings.sent4: Her underreacting to the emergency was like a silent storm brewing.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's underreacting to the misbehaving student was a lesson in patience.

meanings.definition: Showing a lack of response or emotion in a situation.
meanings.sent1: The underreacting student remained quiet during the class discussion.
meanings.sent2: She had an underreacting expression when she heard the surprising news.
meanings.sent3: The underreacting cat just blinked lazily at the loud noise.
meanings.sent4: His underreacting demeanor made it hard to gauge his true feelings.
meanings.sent5: The underreacting audience gave the magician a challenge to impress them.
